tools.name: rotate_to_angle
tools.description: Rotates the robot to a specific angle using gyroscope feedback for precision.

target_angle.description: The target angle in degrees. Positive values rotate clockwise, negative values rotate counter-clockwise. Use values between -180 and 180 degrees for best results.

tools.name: move_distance
tools.description: Moves the robot forward or backward by a specific distance.

distance.description: The distance to move in centimeters. Positive values move forward, negative values move backward. Recommended range is between -100 and 100 cm for accurate movement.

tools.name: view_surroundings
tools.description: Takes a picture with the robot's camera and analyzes what's visible in the environment.
